metadata.title: CVE-2018-21247 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. There is an information leak (of uninitialized memory contents) in the libvncclient/rfbproto.c ConnectToRFBRepeater function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-21247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
veyon package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
x11vnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
